com.percussion.extensions.general
Class PSTextToXml

java.lang.Object
  com.percussion.extension.PSSimpleJavaUdfExtension
      com.percussion.extensions.general.PSTextToXml
All Implemented Interfaces:
IPSExtension, IPSUdfProcessor
public class PSTextToXml
extends PSSimpleJavaUdfExtension

Udf to parse an Xml fragment containing an element and return a Document with the specified root and the parsed element as a child of that root. May be used to retrieve Xml stored in a database column and include it as part of an Xml document returned by a query. When used in the mapper of a query resource, the server will replace Xml element to which the udf is mapped with the returned Xml document and provided that the mapped Xml element name and the specified root name match.

Method Detail

processUdf

public Object processUdf(Object[] params,
                         IPSRequestContext request)
                  throws PSConversionException
Parses the text and returns the document.

Parameters:
params - May not be null. The following parameters are expected:
request - The request context, not null.
Throws:
PSConversionException - If an error occurred during data conversion. This exception takes two parameters, a message code and an argument. You should always pass in zero (0) for the message code.
Param #NameDescriptionRequired?
1 RootName Name of the root element to create. The parsed Xml fragment is appended as a child of this root element. yes
2 XmlFragment String value containing a single well-formed Xml element. May be null or empty, in which case the specified root element is created and returned with no children. yes
